author: ruppert
msg: Added build and log sites so that we can make them pages on ofbiz.apache.org.  These are being committed in their current format running at build.ofbiz.org and log.ofbiz.org respectively.  We need to figure out how these will fit together with the main site, but I wanted the code out there so that everyone can participate in making it better ASAP.
